original_text: The Christians in Macedonia and Achaia were happy to share what they had. But really, they have a duty to help the Jewish Christians in Jerusalem. It is the Jews who shared good things from God to help the Gentiles in their spirits. So now the Gentiles ought to help the Jewish Christians with things that they need for their bodies. 15: Macedonia included the north part of the country that we call Greece. It also included the south part of the country that we call North Macedonia. Achaia was the south part of Greece. The Christians in Macedonia and Achaia were happy to share what they had. But really, they have a duty to help the Jewish Christians in Jerusalem. It is the Jews who shared good things from God to help the Gentiles in their spirits. So now the Gentiles ought to help the Jewish Christians with things that they need for their bodies. 15: Macedonia included the north part of the country that we call Greece. It also included the south part of the country that we call North Macedonia. Achaia was the south part of Greece. The Christians in Macedonia and Achaia were happy to share what they had. But really, they have a duty to help the Jewish Christians in Jerusalem. It is the Jews who shared good things from God to help the Gentiles in their spirits. So now the Gentiles ought to help the Jewish Christians with things that they need for their bodies. 15: Macedonia included the north part of the country that we call Greece. It also included the south part of the country that we call North Macedonia. Achaia was the south part of Greece. The Christians in Macedonia and Achaia were happy to share what they had. But really, they have a duty to help the Jewish Christians in Jerusalem. It is the Jews who shared good things from God to help the Gentiles in their spirits. So now the Gentiles ought to help the Jewish Christians with things that they need for their bodies. 15: Macedonia included the north part of the country that we call Greece. It also included the south part of the country that we call North Macedonia. Achaia was the south part of Greece. The Christians in Macedonia and Achaia were happy to share what they had. But really, they have a duty to help the Jewish Christians in Jerusalem. It is the Jews who shared good things from God to help the Gentiles in their spirits. So now the Gentiles ought to help the Jewish Christians with things that they need for their bodies.
korean_text: 저희가 기뻐서 하였거니와 또한 저희는 그들에게 빚진 자니 만일 이방인들이 그들의 영적인 것을 나눠 가졌으면 육적인 것으로 그들을 섬기는 것이 마땅하니라

sentences.original_text: The Christians in Macedonia and Achaia
were happy to share what they had
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들이 가진 것을 나누는 것을 기뻐했습니다

sentences.original_text: But really, they have a duty
to help the Jewish Christians in Jerusalem
It is the Jews who shared good things from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님으로부터 온 좋은 것들을 나누어 준 이들은 유대인들입니다

sentences.original_text: to help the Gentiles in their spirits
So now the Gentiles ought to help
the Jewish Christians with things that they need
Macedonia included the north part of the country
sentences.korean_translation: 마케도니아는 그 나라의 북부 지역을 포함했습니다

sentences.original_text: It also included the south part of the country
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 그 나라의 남부 지역도 포함했습니다

sentences.original_text: Achaia was the south part of Greece
